item.title: How to Query GitHub for User Contributions in a Specific Timeframe
item.description: I needed needed to find all public GitHub repositories a user has contributed to within a specific timeframe, and wanted to share - and record for myself - the API query I learned. This can be a useful for generating reports, tracking progress, analyzing activity over a certain period, and more. Use the GitHub GraphQL API We leverage the GitHub GraphQL API to get the list of public repositories a user contributed to within a specific timeframe, using the contributionsCollection field to specify a time range and retrieve contributions made by a user during that period.
